com.here.android.mpa.streetlevel

Class StreetLevelBillboardOrientation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.streetlevel.StreetLevelBillboardOrientation

  • public final class StreetLevelBillboardOrientation
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the orientation for StreetLevelBillboard) objects that users can add to a StreetLevelModel. Changes to properties of this interface are reflected in the display of the associated StreetLevelBillboard.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  StreetLevelBillboardOrientation.Orientation
      This enumeration defines values for billboard orientation options
